raw akas.title: Buy It, Fix It, Sell It

akas: Buy It, Fix It, Sell It (original title)
akas from release info: Buy It, Fix It, Sell It (original title)

1.title: Boxed In

episode of.title: Buy It, Fix It, Sell It (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: The Neon brothers meet their match with a tough negotiator while Willy hopes his music-themed artwork can fetch big money from a local record label. Tiffany's storage solution confuses a potential buyer.

2.title: Against the Wall

episode of.title: Buy It, Fix It, Sell It (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: Willy tries to get recognition as a furniture designer while Mike thinks Joe is dead wrong about a zombie-themed project. Tiffany's ambitious installation has a setback the night before the big reveal.

3.title: Chair Champions

episode of.title: Buy It, Fix It, Sell It (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: Tiffany and Willy go after the same vintage chairs, but it's Tiffany who gets the upper hand. Bob decides to invest more money than usual into transforming a piece of furniture.

4.title: Typewriter Tussle

episode of.title: Buy It, Fix It, Sell It (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: Tiffany is coerced into handing over a purchase to the tricky Neon brothers while Willy gambles with a new client in order to secure a sale.

5.title: The Throne of Love

episode of.title: Buy It, Fix It, Sell It (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: Willy's latest transformation forces him to think out of the box while Bob hopes a 50s-themed piece will attract an old buyer. Tiffany needs to create the perfect addition to a client's extravagant condo.

6.title: In Plane Sight

episode of.title: Buy It, Fix It, Sell It (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: Willy risks losing money on his high-flying creation by selling it at an auction while the Neon brothers struggle to make their money back on an expensive purchase. Bob tackles one of his biggest projects yet.

7.title: Bikers and Babes

episode of.title: Buy It, Fix It, Sell It (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: The Neon brothers have to get tough in a negotiation with a neon sign collector, while Tiffany takes a risk on a sexy installation. Willy tries to sell a piece to two members of a motorcycle gang.

8.title: Pull the Rug

episode of.title: Buy It, Fix It, Sell It (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: Tiffany must find the perfect item for a client who is nervous about too much color, while Bob finds an eccentric buyer for his latest creation. A furniture dealer proves to be a formidable opponent for the Neon brothers.

9.title: Vanity Insanity

episode of.title: Buy It, Fix It, Sell It (TV Series 2014– )

9.plot: Willy worries the item he's selling to a local music venue is too big to fit inside, while Tiffany tries to please a spa owner with very specific tastes. The Neon brothers build a custom neon sign for a new client.

10.title: License to Rock

episode of.title: Buy It, Fix It, Sell It (TV Series 2014– )

10.plot: The Neon brothers battle over who will do the work on their latest installation while Bob steps out of his comfort zone to transform a more modern gas pump. Willy resorts to unusual tactics to sell his artwork.

11.title: The Man-delier

episode of.title: Buy It, Fix It, Sell It (TV Series 2014– )

11.plot: Bob is challenged by a piece that may be too old and rusted to transform while a decorative piece from Tiffany proves a tough sell. Willy discovers his chandelier has a mystery buyer.

12.title: Chair Man of the Boards

episode of.title: Buy It, Fix It, Sell It (TV Series 2014– )

12.plot: The Neons struggle to sell a vintage piece to a longtime buyer, while Tiffany must convince a photographer friend to buy two chairs for his studio. Willy thinks he has the perfect piece for a skateboarding school.

13.title: The Besk

episode of.title: Buy It, Fix It, Sell It (TV Series 2014– )

13.plot: Tiffany struggles to build an ambitious kitchen centerpiece for a new client. Willy has an unusual plan to transform a piece of old furniture and the Neon brothers journey to their old neighborhood to sell their new piece.

14.title: Making a Case

episode of.title: Buy It, Fix It, Sell It (TV Series 2014– )

14.plot: Willy is determined to turn his item into a piece of high art, while the Neon brothers discover an ingenious way to transform used sporting goods. Tiffany tries to sell to two clients with very different tastes.

1.title: Blanket Battle

episode of.title: Buy It, Fix It, Sell It (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: Tiffany and the Neon Brothers fight over rare Hudson's Bay pieces and neither side is prepared to lose. Willy has designs on an old chair that could sell for big bucks if he can just find a buyer.

2.title: Mail Box Wars

episode of.title: Buy It, Fix It, Sell It (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: Willy and Bob duke it out over model Winnebagos but they both have the same idea on how to transform them. Tiffany tries to create a high end look with the ugliest item at auction.

3.title: Take a Bath

episode of.title: Buy It, Fix It, Sell It (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: Rob is desperate for an old bathtub that he thinks he can transform into a living room 'must have'. Willy bags a vintage TV and the Neon Brothers outdo themselves with a timely wall piece.

4.title: That's Life

episode of.title: Buy It, Fix It, Sell It (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: Tiffany's in love with a 'Life' magazine collection and the Neon Brothers are in love with a Marilyn Monroe portrait. Willy turns a vintage suitcase into a stunning modern classic.

5.title: Piano Man Rules

episode of.title: Buy It, Fix It, Sell It (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: Rob baffles partner Jules as he bags an old piano. Could it be the key to riches? Willy creates an epic deck chair and the Neon Brothers design a high end table for a trendy office.

6.title: Sweat It Out

episode of.title: Buy It, Fix It, Sell It (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: Willy has an auction meltdown as Bob bids him up on all his top pieces. Tiffany is in trouble as she overspends on a fantasy bedroom for a favourite client. Will anyone make money?

imdb.plot outline: "Buy It, Fix It, Sell It" is best described as a Canadian real life account of an eclectic bunch of artists from Winnipeg, Manitoba. Their goal is to acquire goods via a local auction and transform their purchase into something unique. Next, find someone who will pay big "monies" and go in for the kill. Winner is decided by whomever makes the largest profit from their "project".
imdb.title: Buy It, Fix It, Sell It
plot: "_Buy It, Fix It, Sell It_ (qv)" is best described as a Canadian real life account of an eclectic bunch of artists from Winnipeg, Manitoba. Their goal is to acquire goods via a local auction and transform their purchase into something unique. Next, find someone who will pay big "monies" and go in for the kill. Winner is decided by whomever makes the largest profit from their "project".::Daniel Campbell
